VotingDesk - Class in multicast
The VotingDesk class represents a multicast server that provides the functionalities needed for a given eVoting election to occur.
VotingDesk(String) - Constructor for class multicast.VotingDesk
Initializes a newly created VotingDesk object so that it represents multicast server instance.
VotingDesk.VotingDeskClientHandler - Class in multicast
This private inner class represents a thread instance that will be ran by this VotingDesk server instance managing enqueued clients.
VotingDesk.VotingDeskTerminalManager - Class in multicast
This private inner class represents a thread instance that will be ran by this VotingDesk server instance monitoring the status of all the server connections to the each one the VotingTerminal instances managed by it.
VotingDesk.VotingDeskVotingManager - Class in multicast
This private inner class represents a thread instance that will be ran by this VotingDesk server instance answering to voting and login requests made by the clients using the VotingTerminal instances connected to this server.
VotingDeskClientHandler(String, String) - Constructor for class multicast.VotingDesk.VotingDeskClientHandler
Allocates a new VotingDeskTerminalManager Thread object.
votingDeskID - Variable in class utils.Vote
 
votingDeskServerStartup() - Method in class multicast.VotingDesk
This method is called by the VotingDesk.start() method allowing the creation of all the components required by the server to execute properly.
VotingDeskTerminalManager(String, String) - Constructor for class multicast.VotingDesk.VotingDeskTerminalManager
Allocates a new VotingDeskTerminalManager Thread object.
VotingDeskUI - Class in multicast.ui

votingService(Scanner) - Method in class multicast.VotingTerminal
This method is responsible for starting this VotingTerminal voting service that starts by signaling the server telling that it is ready through the use of a MulticastProtocol.READY message.

VotingTerminal - Class in multicast
